thread.title_full: This 360째 Video of Jonny Greenwood Rehearsing 'There Will Be Blood' Score is the Best Thing You'll See All Day

author: Justin Morrow
title: This 360째 Video of Jonny Greenwood Rehearsing 'There Will Be Blood' Score is the Best Thing You'll See All Day
text:
Justin Morrow February 7, 2017 This 360째 Video of Jonny Greenwood Rehearsing 'There Will Be Blood' Score is the Best Thing You'll See All Day Radiohead guitarist and composer Jonny Greenwood's score for 'There Will Be Blood' is going on the road. 
Though Jonny Greenwood's score for There Will Be Blood , was very well received at the time of the film's release, it was denied an Oscar nomination on the grounds that it contained "preexisting music." ( A ccording to Vulture, " Blood 's soundtrack contains 46 minutes' worth of pieces by Brahms and Estonian composer Arvo Part, among others.) Now, though, it's getting its just desserts and going on the road for a February British tour with the London Contemporary Orchestra. 
Check out this 360-degree video of a recent rehearsal. 
Greenwood has collaborated with P.T. Anderson on each of the director's films since Blood. Greenwood has also scored several other films, including the adaptation of Haruki Murakami's best-selling novel Norwegian Wood , and has worked with luminaries of modern music like Krzysztof Penderecki, the Polish composer whose piece Polymorphia was famously featured in The Shining .
